title: The Jigsaw
description: What would you die for? What would you live for? What would you kill for? The story of struggle with life, with love, with oneself; of obsession and pride; of victory and defeat with no winners and no losers. M/M adult content, graphic scenes, language .Status: In progress/IncompleteLast update: 07/23/2010Word count: approx. 125,207
author: canterro
